Common.Highlight.Common.Text: Now available: White-boxed spec suites with ability to immediately accommodate  5,000-14,000 SF tenants

Further implementation of touchless technology in high traffic areas such as entry/exit, restrooms, etc.

Common.LocationDescription.Common.Text: The property sits on 138 acres, in a park-like campus with panoramic views despite being just minutes away from the amenity-filled commercial district of Monroeville. Access to major arterial roads such as the Route 22, the Parkway East, and the PA Turnpike are all just miles away, and there is Port Authority bus service directly to the campus via Route P68. Next Tier Connect @ Pittsburgh East also boasts the best parking capacity of any major office complex in the area – providing almost 2,100 existing parking spaces with the ability to add even more as demand necessitates.

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text:
Next Tier Connect @ Pittsburgh East is one of the region’s premier suburban office buildings. With an unparalleled infrastructure, white-boxed spec suites, upscale amenities, and a landscaped and wooded campus, you’ll find everything your business needs and your employees want in an office location.

As a former world HQ building versus a speculative office development, Next Tier Connect @ Pittsburgh East features many extra benefits and amenities, including: dual electrical feeds from diverse routes, a combined 5 mega-watt standby generator to support tenant business functions, a 400 kilo-watt emergency diesel generator for critical life/safety functions, multiple fiber providers, a shipping/receiving area with three loading docks, and a centralized security command center. New, well capitalized ownership is committed to also bringing best-in-class amenities to Next Tier Connect @ Pittsburgh East including: a new fitness center, renovated and expanded conferencing center with pre-function break out rooms, activation of indoor/outdoor spaces, enhanced on-site café options, and re-imagined common areas.

Common.Strapline.Common.Text: We're Elevating the Tenant Experience - Get Connected at Pittsburgh’s Premier Office and Technology Space
